channel.title: TF2's Blood brothers comic, Man vs Machine is close. The game's second ARG
channel.description:
First. I made this thread when I noticed none did, second I did it because if you like tf2's... curious storyline this is it's greatest revolution. First things first: what is Man VS Machine? It's a gamemode that the tf2 community belives that will appear shortly in tf2. Further explanation in this video: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TzxpbUeN-eg&feature=g-u-u[/url]
Now, after this explanation, a second ARG happened these last days on tf2. Here's the the game's official wiki explanation: [url]https://wiki.teamfortress.com/wiki/ARG#Second_ARG[/url] and lastly, here's the webcomic: [url]https://www.teamfortress.com/bloodbrothers/[/url] If you preffer it in a youtube video: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OAC4xocrrT8&feature=g-u-u[/url]
Discuss

item.title: TF2's Blood brothers comic, Man vs Machine is close. The game's second ARG
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

Protip: DO NOT let giant scouts grab the bomb.

I learnt it the hard way…

BTW. if a tank appears with some giant robots, shoot the robots first and fast. Then concentrate all your crit canteens and all your ammo in the tank.

Then go back into kickin’ rwabot asses.

Read full topic

item.title: TF2's Blood brothers comic, Man vs Machine is close. The game's second ARG
item.dc:creator: G-Rona
item.description:
You pay money completely cosmetic items, so it’s no different than buying a hat from the store. That ticket does nothing to the gameplay itself, it doesn’t make you get into servers faster, it doesn’t make the game easier, nothing! Just those cosmetic items.

Unless you’re one of those filthy hardcore traders who overpice everything and claim those to be “so damn rare” and worth 10 vintage earbills.

Read full topic

item.title: TF2's Blood brothers comic, Man vs Machine is close. The game's second ARG
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
my experience of gameplay:
Playin’ alone: 1st wave defeated me. The soldierbots are problematic if you’re alone
Playin’ with 5 more people:
Co-operation is always needed here, the bots are dumb as hell but they know how to aim.
The Soldierbots and the Demobots are the worst as they spawn often, come in large groups and will shoot thousands of projectiles at you if they manage to get you in range, I highly recommend having some medics or dispensers close by because many of the times you won’t get into a health kit alive. Upgrade your primary weapon a lot, and if you are a spy upgrade your sapper and then upgrade your knife to be armor piercing and be able to stab giants. Also I recommend Dead Ringer and L’etranger as it will save your life more than what you expect. As a heavy Upgrade your primary weapon and your speed, I recommend taking down projectiles upgrade when the soldiers and demos come in big groups.
As a pyro try to teamwork, if you go alone to the frontline you won’t stand much.

Oh and [COLOR=‘Red’]TRY TO GRAB AS MANY CREDITS AS YOU CAN! The more you have the more upgrades you can buy

Read full topic

item.title: TF2's Blood brothers comic, Man vs Machine is close. The game's second ARG
item.dc:creator: King_Kaddo
item.description:
my experience for now:

-try out waiting list, get stuck at ~60minutes waiting time
-search manually for servers, find plenty of empty servers, only 6 players, the fuck what?!
-find server with 1 player, can’t connect, repeat
-find server with 1 player and connect, it fucking works, alright the robots are almost here, the robots spawn, L L L L L L LL L AAA A AA G G
-FUCK THIS!!!
